title: AI Feature User Research Framework
shortDescription: Understand user needs, trust levels, and AI literacy for intelligent features.
jobsToBeDone: Understand user readiness for AI features

inputs.label: Current Manual Workflow
inputs.example: Manual data entry from PDFs into ERP, 15 mins per invoice

inputs.label: AI Capability Being Introduced
inputs.example: Automated extraction and validation of invoice fields

inputs.label: Consequence of AI Errors
inputs.example: Incorrect payments, audit failures, vendor disputes
